Committee: Veterans, Homeland Security And Military Affairs

Milestones.Committee: Veterans, Homeland Security And Military Affairs

Actions.Text: REFERRED TO VETERANS, HOMELAND SECURITY AND MILITARY AFFAIRS

Title: Authorizes guidelines for granting contracts to disabled veterans eligible under the home for heroes program
Summary: Authorizes guidelines for granting contracts to disabled veterans eligible under the access to home for heroes program.
LawCode: Add Art 33 §§1300 - 1302, Priv Hous Fin L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the private housing finance law, in relation to disabled veteran access to home for heroes contracts
